Name: Elderberry
Description: Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!

DescriptionLocalization.es: ¡Tu madre era un hámster y tu padre olía a bayas de saúco!
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 니 엄마는 햄스터고 니 아빠는 엘더베리 냄새가 난다네!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Wird zu Saft gepresst, der bei Erkältungen hilft!
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Ta mère était un hamster et ton père puait l'sureau ! (Cf. Monty Python ; les paysans trop pauvres faisaient de l'eau-de-vie avec du sureau à la place du vin)
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Édesanyád volt a hörcsög és édesapádnak bodzaillata volt!
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 「Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!」
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Sua mãe era um hamster e seu pai cheirava a sabugueiro!
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Твоя мать была хомяком, а отец пах бузиной!
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Annen bir hamsterdı ve baban da mürver kokuyordu!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 你妈妈是一只仓鼠，那你的父亲闻起来有一股接骨木的气味！（原句的英文这是一句在外国骂人的话）接骨木主要具有中医药用途。
